long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rephrase, summarize, translate, or explain text on any website without copy-pasting

This tool to help you write, rephrase, summarize, translate, explain, or reply to any text on any website without the hassle of copy-pasting.

✔️ Highest quality responses that outcompete all other tools in the market
✔️ Works in all Chromium-based browsers, such as Chrome, Brave, and Edge
✔️ Works on all sites.
✔️ All languages are supported

It's like Notion AI, but works literally everywhere on the web. 🪄
